body:
- This adds `spack -H`, which does the same thing as `spack help --all`

- I've also intuitively told users to type this and I've been wrong b/c it doesn't exist.

- I keep typing this accidentally based on `spack test -h` and `spack test -H`, and this PR finally makes my fingers happy.
title: help: add `spack -H` shortcut for `spack help --all`
